meanings.definition: Contaminators: People or things that introduce impurities or pollutants into something.
meanings.sent1: The contaminators in the river were the factories upstream.
meanings.sent2: The contaminators in the kitchen were the dirty sponges.
meanings.sent3: The contaminators at the picnic were the ants in the sugar bowl.
meanings.sent4: The contaminators of trust in the relationship were the constant lies.
meanings.sent5: The contaminators of the air were the smokestacks billowing dark clouds.

meanings.definition: Contaminators: Those who cause something to become impure or unclean.
meanings.sent1: The contaminators of the classroom were the students who didn't wash their hands.
meanings.sent2: The contaminators of the party were the guests who spilled drinks everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The contaminators at the zoo were the mischievous monkeys throwing food around.
meanings.sent4: The contaminators of peace in the neighborhood were the noisy neighbors.
meanings.sent5: The contaminators of joy were the negative thoughts that clouded her mind.
